short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows user to put down information in a quick and safe location. Enhance their Google Chrome Browser experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever had issues with trying to write something quickly but can't find a piece of paper around you? Now it's no longer a problem with our EasyNotes app, the ultimate note-taking Chrome extension. EasyNotes allows you to quickly save your thoughts with access to 3 save files and 3 load files to keep track of your most important thoughts. This user-friendly note-taking app ensures you don't have to worry about interruptions. Designed with simplicity in mind, EasyNotes comes with an easy-to-follow guide. Stay tuned for future updates with more features to enhance your productivity.
